import React, {useState} from 'react'; import { Avatar, Breadcrumbs as MuiBreadcrumbs, Button, Box, Card, CardContent, Divider, FormControl as MuiFormControl, Grid, Input, InputLabel, MenuItem, Link, TextField, Typography } from "@material-ui/core"; import axios from 'axios' export default function Project(){ const [name,setName] = useState(""); const [what,setWhat] = useState(""); const [year,setYear] = useState(0); const onSubmit = e =>{ e.preventDefault(); const award = { name:name, what:what, year:year } axios.post('http://localhost:5000/award/add', award) .then((res) => alert(res.data)) } return( Add Awards
setName(e.target.value)} variant="outlined" fullWidth /> setWhat(e.target.value)} variant="outlined" fullWidth multiline rows={4} /> setYear(e.target.value)} variant="outlined" fullWidth multiline rows={4} />

) }
